snippet.title: Jumplight Odyssey - Official Reveal & Story Trailer
snippet.description:
KEEP HOPE ALIVE AND WISHLIST ON STEAM NOW: https://bit.ly/JumplightOdyssey

Gather survivors, repair and build out your starship, brave black holes, and fend off pirates, all while managing the daily soap opera of your colorful crew. Adventure to the mythical Forever Star in this FTL-meets-Star Blazers videogame by League of Geeks!

Don’t forget to join the Jumplight Odyssey community: 
https://twitter.com/JumplightGame
https://www.tiktok.com/@leagueofgeeksofficial
https://facebook.com/LeagueofGeeks
https://discord.gg/zqx9PFWwZ8

Sign up to stay up to date with exclusive news from us:
https://jumplightodyssey.com

Original soundtrack by Michael Allen
